item.title: More Than 100 Die In U.S. Gun Violence Since Sandy Hook
item.description: U.S. Shooting Deaths Since Sandy Hook Top 100: WASHINGTON -- The night after Sandy Hook, a gunman pulled behind ... http://t.co/znmZJol2
item.content:encoded: U.S. Shooting Deaths Since Sandy Hook Top 100: WASHINGTON -- The night after Sandy Hook, a gunman pulled behind ... http://t.co/znmZJol2 WASHINGTON -- The night after Sandy Hook, a gunman pulled behind a car in Kansas City's east side and opened fire, striking 4-year-old Aydan Perea in the head. The boy had just gotten into his father's car. Link - Trackbacks

item.title: NRA Top Lobbyist's Speech Was A Total Public Relations Disaster, Experts Say
item.description: Wayne LaPierre Speech Was A Total Public Relations Disaster, Say PR Experts - Huffington Post http://t.co/c21VcdJj #pr
item.content:encoded: Wayne LaPierre Speech Was A Total Public Relations Disaster, Say PR Experts - Huffington Post http://t.co/c21VcdJj #pr Public relations experts who have experience working with the gun industry expressed horror on Friday afternoon at the National Rifle Association's response to the Newtown, Conn., shootings. The group's executive vice president, Wayne LaPierre, struck a scolding tone on Friday, blaming the video game industry and media for exposing youth to a culture of violence, and calling for armed police or security guards in schools: "The only thing that stops a bad guy with a gun is a good guy with a gun," LaPierre said. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.title: DA: 4 dead, including gunman, along rural Pa. road
item.description: Prosecutor says four people are dead, including the suspected gunman, in a shooting in Pennsylvania: http://t.co/ZoDGaBV4 -RAS
item.content:encoded: Prosecutor says four people are dead, including the suspected gunman, in a shooting in Pennsylvania: http://t.co/ZoDGaBV4 -RAS HOLLIDAYSBURG, Pa. (AP) ‚Äî A prosecutor says four people are dead, including the suspected gunman, in a shooting along a rural road in central Pennsylvania.Blair County District Attorney Rich Consiglio says three people were shot Friday morning in Frankstown Township, about 70 miles west of Harrisburg.Consiglio says two men and a woman were shot and killed and the suspected gunman also died.State police say one trooper was struck by gunfire but escaped serious injury because the shot struck his bulletproof vest.Consiglio says two other troopers were injured but not shot.The identities of the victims and gunman weren't immediately released. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: ap.org

item.title: DEPUTIES_TEXT
item.description: Yup. http://t.co/VV9xYGu0 RT @robertniles There was an armed security guard in the school at Columbine. He couldn't stop it, either.
item.content:encoded: Yup. http://t.co/VV9xYGu0 RT @robertniles There was an armed security guard in the school at Columbine. He couldn't stop it, either. Jefferson County Sheriff‚Äôs Deputy Neil Gardner soon would complete his second year as the uniformed community resource officer assigned to Columbine High School. Gardner, a 15-year veteran of the Sheriff‚Äôs Office, normally ate his lunch with the students in the cafeteria during first lunch period. His car would have been parked in his ‚Äúnormal spot‚Äù in front of the cafeteria doors - between the junior and senior parking lots. Link - Trackbacks
